short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Modifies the D&D beyond encounter runner to include enemy status messages based on percent health

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds health status messages to the D&D Beyond Encounter Builder so that you can describe to your players the health status of the different combatants. This tool is made to help the DM have a standard range of health status messages and you are encouraged to elaborate on the monsters condition but throw the health message in so your players can intuit to what degree the character / monster is wounded.
